Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Lawrence/Marine Drive
ShortDescription: Eastbound 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Clarendon, Wilson, and Marine Drive due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Marine Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Clarendon, Wilson, and Marine Drive due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Marine Drive.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53A South Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/44th
ShortDescription: 53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 47th, Cicero, 31st, and Pulaski due to, street blockage near Pulaski/44th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, 47th, Cicero, 31st, and Pulaski due to, street blockage near Pulaski/44th.

Allow extra travel time.
